title: Ellie Christmas Makeup
description: Ellie Christmas Makeup is a beauty game that offers a joyful experience in the world of holiday makeovers. Dive into the seasonal spirit as you guide Ellie through three enchanting Christmas-themed looks: Candy Cane Queen, Christmas Queen, and iconic character-inspired. Unleash your creativity with an array of eyeshadows, lipsticks, blushes, accessories, and more. Get ready for a holly jolly transformation filled with color, cheer, and the magic of the holiday season!
